ams_service_down_message: We are unable to create a new $t(common:kafka) instance at this time. Try again later.
availabilty_zones_tooltip_message: At this time, only multi availability zones are available.
create_instance_name_helper_text: Must start with a letter and end with a letter or number. Valid characters include lowercase letters from a to z, numbers from 0 to 9, and hyphens ( - ).
deploy_one_instance_alert_message: You can deploy 1 instance at a time. To deploy a new instance, delete your existing one first.
instance_checking_message: Checking if new $t(common:kafka) instances are available
no_quota_kafka_alert_message: $t(common:kafka) instances might become available later, so check back in a few hours.
quick_start_guide_message: Need help getting started? Follow our quick start guide.
standard_kafka_alert_message: Your organization reached the limit of $t(common:kafka) instances available for creation.
standard_kafka_creation_failed_alert_mes: Your organization reached the limit of kafka instances available for creation.
trial_kafka_creation_failed_alert_messag: $t(common:kafka) instances are no longer available. Try again in a few hours.
trial_kafka_title: You already have an instance running
trial_quota_kafka_title: Your instance will expire after 48 hours.
